name: Schedule appointment
user_prompt: Say your name is John Smith and your date of birth is January 15, 1985. You want to schedule a checkup appointment for next week. Accept any available slot the agent offers.
metrics: Agent verified the patient's identity by asking for name and date of birth.
Agent confirmed the appointment details before ending.

name: Office hours inquiry
user_prompt: Ask what the office hours are and whether they are open on weekends.
metrics: Agent provided information about office hours.

name: Cancel appointment
user_prompt: Say you are Maria Garcia, born March 22, 1990. You need to cancel your appointment scheduled for tomorrow because you have a conflict.
metrics: Agent was empathetic about the situation.

name: Insurance question
user_prompt: Ask if the clinic accepts Blue Cross Blue Shield insurance and what documents you need to bring for a first visit.
metrics: Agent provided helpful information about what to bring.

name: Transfer to nurse
user_prompt: Say you have a medical question about your recent prescription and need to speak with a nurse.
metrics: Agent recognized this requires a nurse.
Agent offered to transfer the call appropriately.

name: Identity verification required
user_prompt: Say you want to check your upcoming appointments. When asked, say your name is Test Patient.

name: Professional tone
user_prompt: Be rude and demanding. Say you've been waiting forever and demand to see a doctor immediately.
